name: The Long Bright Dark
summary: Former Louisiana State CID partners Martin Hart and Rustin Cohle give separate statements to a pair of investigators about the murder of a prostitute, Dora Lange, 17 years earlier. As they look back, details of the crime, replete with occult overtones, are accompanied by insights into the detectives' volatile partnership and personal lives.

name: Seeing Things
summary: Under pressure to land a suspect in the Lange murder, Quesada warns Hart and Cohle that they might be replaced by three detectives from a new task force. The pair lobbies for extra time to follow up on a lead that takes them from a rural cathouse to an incinerated church. With his marriage to Maggie already strained by work, Hart finds respite away from home.

name: The Locked Room
summary: Hidden image at the burned-out church leads Cohle and Hart to Joel Theriot, a tent-revival minister whose parishioners finger a scarred "tall man" seen with Dora Lange. Brought in for interrogation, a sex offender matching the description is quickly dismissed by Cohle, despite offering a confession. Hart gets sidetracked after Maggie sets Cohle up with a friend at a C&W bar. Looking to establish a pattern of murder, Cohle pores over old case files, finding a connection with a woman assumed to have drowned years earlier.

name: Who Goes There
summary: Hart and Cohl follow a series of dangerous leads in an effort to locate prime suspect Reggie Ledoux.

name: The Secret Fate of All Life
summary: Hart and Cohle share the spoils of a solved case; Papania and Gilbough confront the detectives with troubling new intelligence.

name: Haunted Houses
summary: Maggie sheds light on Cohle's activities in 2002, when his relationship with Hart fractured and he quit the force.

name: After You've Gone
summary: Hart and Cohle forge a truce to probe a murky string of disappearances that tie to the symbology of the Dora Lange murder and the Tuttle family.

name: Form and Void
summary: An overlooked detail provides Hart and Cohle with an important new lead in their 17-year-old case.

name: The Western Book of the Dead
summary: The disappearance of a city manager disrupts a lucrative land scheme and ignites an investigation involving three police officers and a career criminal who is moving into legitimate business.

name: Night Finds You
summary: Ben Caspar's autopsy reveals the gruesome details of his demise, and Ray and Ani wonder if it has anything to do with his fondness for prostitutes. Meanwhile, Frank looks into what might have happened to his missing fortune.

name: Maybe Tomorrow
summary: Ani lets Ray know she's in charge after he goes rogue on the investigation, even though he stumbles on crucial evidence that takes the case in a new direction. Meanwhile, Frank meets with his former associates in the criminal underworld, but they make it clear they're not taking orders from him anymore; and Paul hits the streets to see if Caspar's face rings a bell.

name: Down Will Come
summary: The detail works a pawn shop lead to close in on a suspect in the Caspere case. Frank revisits his past to pay for his present.

name: Other Lives
summary: Ray and Frank contemplate new life choices; Ani and Paul follow a lead up the coast.

name: Church in Ruins
summary: Desperate to locate a missing woman with intel on Caspere, Frank meets with Mexican drug dealers. Ani infiltrates an exclusive inner circle, with Ray and Paul keeping close tabs.

name: Black Maps and Motel Rooms
summary: Ray, Ani and Paul take precautionary measures to elude detection and untangle a dark mystery. Frank deals with the fallout of his betrayal.

name: Omega Station
summary: Frank, Ray and Ani weigh their options as Caspere's killer and the scope of corruption are revealed.
